department: Minister of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
short_summary: Request for proposal to supply 3 x 40 foot, 20 foot, 3 x 10 foot long sea containers with customization
description: Provide 40 foot, 20 foot, 3 x 10 foot long sea containers with special requirements. Includes option to purchase extra goods.

full_summary:
=================

**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Tender Title**: Various Sea Containers RFP

**Tender Reference Number**: WS3975200931-Doc3976216037

**Solicitation Number**: WS3975200931

**Publication Date**: April 21, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: May 19, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time

**Description**
---------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is soliciting a proposal from qualified suppliers for the design, customization, and supply of (3) 40-foot long sea containers, (1) 20-foot long sea container, and (3) 10-foot long sea containers with special requirements.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The successful vendor will be required to design, manufacture, and deliver to spec the aforementioned sea containers. The scope of work includes the option to purchase additional goods.

**Location of Work**
-------------------

Deliveries are expected to be made to the Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Scott (FMFCS) in Canada.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

**Evaluation Criteria**
---------------------

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further information regarding this tender, please contact Bronwen Grieve, Contracting Officer, at bronwen.grieve@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or visit the notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16067524?extsite=MTYwNjc1MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Tender Documents**
--------------------

Please find attached the tender documents, including the complete specifications, terms, and conditions.

**Language of Communication**
-----------------------------

English and French.

**Important Dates**
------------------

* Tender Closing Date: May 19, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time
* Expected Contract Start Date: May 24, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

Note that the rewritten entry has been reformatted to better reflect standard tender announcement formats and to present the information in a clear and concise manner. Only the most relevant details have been included, while still providing adequate information for interested suppliers. 400 words is the standard length for
